item.title: Troubleshooting MongoDB on Mac
item.description: Create /data/db chmod -R 777 /data/db ulimit -n 1000 Links source1 source2

item.title: MongoDB Basics
item.description: Basic Commands show dbs Show databases use dbName Connect/Select database use dbName Create database (MongoDB doesn’t actually create a db until we start storing documents, so although you now have the db bookmarks, it’s not actually saved anywhere until we put some data in it. Same goes for collectons ) db show the db you are using doc show the document content NoSQL Database Terms MongoDB MySQL Collections Tables Documents Rows Fields (key:value pairs) Columns Adding Data There are two methods.
